body_html:
Hi guys, I'm also interested in this feature as I'm currently implementing some complex algorithm to be integrated into pytorch with a ATen backend. Stream-based parallelism is one option to get batch functionality.

It's maybe misplaced here, but do u have any advice where i can get some insight to do this on ATen level? Without any knowledge of the code base it's kind of tough ;) cheers c
